item.title: Responsive Web Design Certification
item.description: freeCodeCamp I came across freeCodeCamp  a while ago, bookmarked it and forgot about it again. Going through my bookmarks some weeks ago, I re-discovered it and actually had a look at what they’re doing this time. As it turned out, they’ve got a huge collection of thousands of coding lessons including certifications that they’re offering for free based on donations. I didn’t hesitate (this time) and started getting into their first course for the so called Responsive Web Design Certification.
